description: It's getting hot in here!!!! As the Summer Vengeance Tournament progresses only the best of the best are left to compete. Ariel "The Assassin" if the 2 year reigning champ at UltimateSurrender.com. But Bella Rossi is bigger, and she's had a year to train and try to bring down the champ and steal the title. Can she do it?! Watch and find out
title: SUMMER VENGEANCE TOURNAMENT: "The Assassin" vs "The Annihilator"
